content: I’m with Benjamin. Investing in myself like this for 60–90 minutes a day is the secret to my success. Ben Franklin already summarized it: early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise. Every morning do something for your health, wealth, and wisdom. Think about it. Health is your foundation — it makes everything else possible. Money brings freedom — the freedom to live the life you choose. Knowledge is power — the power to do and become. After 5, 10, 20 years, the compound interest from this constant investment daily practice is both figurative and literal. I’m convinced that it’s the secret to ‘a good life.’ Funny to call it a secret, but that’s what it feels like. It’s wisdom hiding in plain sight. The Benjamins (Franklin and Hardy) understand it and have told you about it, but few of you will really do it. Doing it takes more than motivation, it takes a system and a plan. Otherwise you will surely fail. Human nature is to give up after a few days. I am going deep on the Why, What, and How of this First Habit.
